summary: It's the tenth anniversary of the Interstellar Alliance, and President Sheridan is on his way to Babylon 5 for the celebration. However, he must first deal with a threat from the future, while Lochley handles a case of demonic possession.
cast: Bruce Boxleitner|Tracy Scoggins|Peter Woodward|Alan Scarfe|Bruce Ramsay|Keegan MacIntosh|Teryl Rothery|Craig Veroni|Richard Biggs|Peter Jurasik|Andreas Katsulas|Ally Warren
keywords: reference to custer's last stand|new hitler|killing baby hitler dilemma|changing the future|saving the world
director: Directors: J. Michael Straczynski, Sara Barnes
title: Babylon 5: The Lost Tales
